long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your Asset.
In general, the decentralized WEB has a high threshold, and even those people who are interested in sometimes get frustrated on the way.
We have been trying to catch up the useful UI and UX for such users, and released Shinobi Wallet with the theme of “Easy and Safe”.
With Shinobi Wallet, you can:
-Deposit with ERC20&BEP20&Polygon-based tokens
-Send ERC20&BEP20&Polygon-based tokens
-View all transaction history of your wallet.
